segments.text: This kitchen scene is truly a masterclass in domestic negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m watching the woman diligently drying her plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring over the sink's edge, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s just infuriating to see such a lack of awareness in a potentially dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, behind her, the children are creating their own brand of havoc.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is going to tip over any second, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, aiding and abetting this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scenario feels like a disaster waiting to happen, on multiple fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip on that wet floor, or the boy will fall from the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water damage to those cabinets will be significant too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just shout at them to pay attention!
segments.speaker: PAR
